Journal.Title: Journal of occupational and environmental medicine

Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID and Occupational Medicine Practice.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: From the National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, US Department of Health and Human Services, Washington, District of Columbia (J.H.); Division of Occupational and Environmental Medicine, University of Maryland School of Medicine, Baltimore, Maryland (M.C.); and Occupational Medicine, Mayo Clinic, Rochester, Minnesota (G.V.).

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Howard, Cloeren, and Vanichkachorn have no relationships/conditions/circumstances that present potential conflict of interest.
